${ModID}:StartingGun.NAME: Starting Gun
${ModID}:StartingGun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Shuffle !M! *Horses into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Trample.NAME: Trample
${ModID}:Trample.DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 Weak. NL ${ModID}:Flurry: Enemy loses !M! HP.

${ModID}:TakeTheLead.NAME: Take the Lead
${ModID}:TakeTheLead.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you've played 5 or more cards this turn, deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:Homestretch.NAME: Homestretch
${ModID}:Homestretch.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Horse into your hand. NL Whenever you draw a card this turn, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

${ModID}:LuckyHorseshoe.NAME: Lucky Horseshoe
${ModID}:LuckyHorseshoe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL A random card in your draw pile costs 0 this turn.

${ModID}:Derby.NAME: Derby
${ModID}:Derby.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! *Horses into your draw pile. NL At the end of your turn, if you played 6+ cards, gain 1 Strength.

${ModID}:Giddyap.NAME: Giddyap
${ModID}:Giddyap.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Horse into your hand.

${ModID}:TheSpin.NAME: The Spin
${ModID}:TheSpin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each card played this turn.

${ModID}:OffToTheRaces.NAME: Off to the Races
${ModID}:OffToTheRaces.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain 2 Dexterity. NL ${ModID}:Flurry: Gain 1 Strength.
